short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Socialize your New Tab with quick links to popular social sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily customize your new tab with SocialTab! You can easily navigate to popular social networks.  SocialTab is a FREE extension that is simple to use and with its modern interface you will love opening that new tab...  Keep Sharing, and stay social :-) 

This is my first published extension, so I hope you find SocialTab helpful and I will periodically update links. Leave me a comment letting me know how SocialTab has been useful for you!
